v0.1.0.description:
# Dark Cloud 1 v0.1.0
First release! Utan%
## Game
- The georama for the first 2 dungeons are currently the only things shuffled
- Many scenes/conversations are removed if they don't yield an item
- Georama pieces will automatically be placed in their respective buildings.  If you get an item and don't see it, it is likely for a building you don't own yet; trust that it is there (this will change in 0.2)
  - Also, it *should* be safe to move pieces around, but do so carefully as once you complete a building, you can't take pieces back out and could lock yourself out of progress to build the wrong buildings.
- Save stating is currently untested, so use at your own peril! (It should be fine in most situations, just save state after connecting the client)
- This is the first release, so there will likely be bugs

## Known issues
- `!collect` handling is not yet implemented
- Previously collected atla won't be sent to the server on connection, so make sure to only collect atla while the client is connected for now
- The client will likely crash if you close the emulator


[Setup](https://github.com/Lizardman175/DC1AP/tree/main?tab=readme-ov-file#readme)
v0.1.0.title: DC1AP 0.1.0

v0.1.1.description:
# Dark Cloud 1 Rando V0.1.1

## Client
- Removed debug log about bit nums
- Handle other games collecting their items from DC
- Check for atla collected while the client wasn't connected to the game

## Known issues
Certain event flags are being set, skipping things not intended to be skipped like the werewolf fight.  Manual fix: open the pcsx2 debugger, go to memory address 01CE43B5 and set it to 07

This update is safe to use with existing games.  There were no .apworld changes; .apworld file supplied for convenience.
v0.1.1.title: DC1AP 0.1.1

v0.1.2.description:
# Dark Cloud 1 Rando v0.1.2
## Client
- Fix for game version check on newer emulator versions
- Fixed issue preventing werewolf duel (requires starting a new game)
  - To manually fix this for existing saves, enable PCSX2 debugger, go to 01CE43B5 and set the value to 07

This update is safe to use with existing games. There were no .apworld changes.

## Known issues
There is a chance you won't receive an item in game that you see in the log.  You'll need to ask the host to do /send <slot> <item> to get the item in that instance.
v0.1.2.title: DC1AP v0.1.2

v0.2.0.description:
# Dark Cloud 1 Rando v0.2.0 Saia%
Happy Thanksgiving! (Canadian; Early)

## Changes
1. Added Queens/Shipwreck.  Goal option now goes to 3!
    - Recruiting Goro will unlock Queens.  Getting Ruby before Goro causes all sorts of problems so the game has to be more linear than I'd like for now.
    - No need to have Yaya dance on your head.  The flags will be set for those scenes after the building completion scene with her now.
        - This also means Rando's shop goes away as soon as you chat with Yaya after finishing the Divining House, so buy things you need there first!
2. Changed georama pieces to be progressive
    - General progression rules: Building -> All pieces that yield miracle chests -> NPCs -> Other pieces -> Stray Cat (it just felt right having the cat be last for Toan's house)
3. Added ABS multiplier YAML option for faster (or slower?) weapon exp growth
4. Added starter weapons YAML option to jump start the game a bit with some free early game weapons (Shamshir, Steel slingshot, etc.)
5. Background logic and item classification updates to make chest rando smoother to develop some day
6. Improved message received dialog so other dialogs/entering a dungeon floor don't stomp on it (items are still received regardless of the messages displayed)
7. Fixed race condition preventing receipt of items from other games in the multi-world
8. Fixed a client crash when trying to connect with a bad slot name
9. Improved boss kill handling
10. Future town georama menus are no longer visible until you have access to the town (recruit Xiao/Goro). This was giving the player early access to the towns that could lead to issues if you get the characters out of sequence.
11. Misc code improvements
12. Secret bonus update :)

### Will not work with existing MWs
v0.2.0.title: DC1AP v0.2.0

v0.2.1.description:
### Client changes
Fixed a bug in the client not correctly giving georama items if the player shuffled them around.  Also fixes a text bug showing the wrong town name in the client log.

No effect on existing games. No change to .apworld; apworld supplied for convenience.
v0.2.1.title: DC1AP v0.2 Patch #1

v0.3.0.description:
# Dark Cloud 1 Rando v0.3.0 || I Dream of (Dark) Genie%
Happy Halloween!

## Changes
1. Added last 3 towns(!!)
    - For All Bosses option, kill dark genie last!
2. Added option to auto build towns as building pieces are collected
    - It is "safe" to move buildings around, but the game has error handling to clean up pieces placed wrong so depending on what is moved where, other buildings may not place.
    - One Matataki River doesn't place so the missable chests aren't lost from river completion.
3. Changed handling of boss kills to prevent being locked out of bosses if fought out of order
4. Fixed an issue that could result in the free feather having no duration and breaking instantly
5. Added manifest file for AP 0.7 compatibility

The client should be compatible with 0.2 generated worlds, but I haven't tested it.  Save states are not fully supported yet, make sure to use normal saves to avoid issues.
v0.3.0.title: DC1AP v0.3

v0.3.1.description:
Quick generation bug fix update
# Changes
- Fixed a bug that was causing a MW was generated with 2+ DC1 games to generate too many items.
- Changed logic so all 8 Matataki river pieces are considered required so all 8 are logically available before Goro, resulting in potentially less waiting in MWs.

No effect on existing MWs and no change to the client.
v0.3.1.title: DC1 AP v0.3 Patch #1

v0.4.0.description:
# Dark Cloud 1 AP Rando v0.4.0 || It's a Christmas Miracle (Chest)!
## Changes
### Miracle Chests:
 - Added option to randomize miracle chests (and the mayor's prickly)
   - 2 chests in Bunbuku's house aren't randomized since they can be missable
 - General item levels:
   - Defense and pockets are progression; fruits of eden are half/half progression and useful; gourds and attachments are useful; others are filler
 - Limited how many fruits/gourds can be received based on recruited chars to save inventory space
 - Defense items are ignored on the client until the related character is recruited
 - Items are currently mapped to vanilla, so there is always 11 bread, 10 tasty water, etc. in the item pool
 - Inventory received in town will be displayed via an overlay

### Attachment Multiplier:
 - New option to multiply attachment values
 - Option to only multiply those from the MW or also those found otherwise in game
 - Attack+ etc. are only multiplied if from the server as it isn't easy to know if an existing + attachment has already been multiplied or not

### Starter Weapons
 - Fixed Shamshir to correctly start with thunder rather than ice
 - Added 1 for each element of Ruby's platinum bangle so she can open any of her doors

### Misc changes:
 - Changed GUI to Avalonia, so hopefully no more lag/memory leak issues. Big releases can still cause some brief lag but its not as bad.
 - Improved protection against loading the wrong file by adding the room seed to the save file
 - Small changes to georama names
 - Changes to the order geo pieces are received to account for chest logic
 - Fixed 2 buildings in Queens not facing the way I intended with autobuild
 - Fixed only needing the Divining House done to access Saia.  Now requires watching the Cathedral's completion scene to fight Saia like vanilla.
 - Changed how ABS multiplier works, should be more reliable
 - Universal Tracker now works with DC1
 - Small effeciency improvements to rule logic to speed up world gen
 - Save state loading should be a little better, but isn't perfect yet.  Just reset the game before loading the save state. Still prefer using normal saves for safety.
 - Optional .pnach file to allow display of all towns' georama inventories

### Known issues:
 - Save before getting Ruby, there is a known bug causing the client to fail giving the floor update and her extra weapon
 - The client doesn't have highlight like other clients for now
 - The client doesn't log hints
 - Enter key in the text box doesn't send, have to hit the 'send' button directly
v0.4.0.title: DC1AP v0.4

v0.4.1.description:
# Changes
 - Fixed a bug causing the client to not properly register recruiting Ruby

No changes to the .apworld or .pnach files
v0.4.1.title: DC1 AP v0.4 Patch #1

v0.4.2.description:
# Changes
Added deathlink
Possibly fixed The Bug?  If nothing else, made the client use less resources.  Added a related bit of error handling in some possible cases.
Fixed minor issues with georama data in the client

Please keep an eye out for an error log in the client like: "Failed to add _georama name_, please report...".  If this happens, it should be safe to save.  Just need to restart either the client or the game and you should get the missing item(s).
v0.4.2.title: DC1 AP v0.4 Patch #2

v0.4.2_update.description:
# Client changes

- Fixed _The Bug_ causing georama pieces to go missing

No server changes, works with old worlds
v0.4.2_update.title: DC1AP The Bug Fix test build
